content.rendered:
At the heart of the story is Meredith Gray, the purposeful woman who does her best to live a full life with a responsible job that makes it all impossible. She works as a first-year surgical trainee at Seattle Grace Hospital with her friends Cristina Yang, who is also in their residency, Izzie Stevens, George O’Malley and Alex Karev, with whom they were still sitting at the desk yesterday. Today, however, lives depend on them.”

Number of Seasons: 19 (2005- )

Status: Ongoing

Creator: Shonda Rhimes

Channel: ABC

Starring: Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr.
